snippet.title: Galaxy Highways - Trailer
snippet.description:
Galaxy Highways trailer with commentary covering the current state of the development, main mechanics and story elements we have in our game.

In our game the player is attacked by waves of enemies. Waves are spawned only when player is outside of main objective areas. By killing the wave, player can repair his ship however this cannot be done indefinitely as waves are increasingly powerful!

You can choose from different ships with different stats and primary weapons. On top of that you can unlock and upgrade secondary and special weapons in a separate research trees. Then you can mount those weapons to any of your ships.

We have a comix style cutscenes with voiceover and story dialogs with different characters to tell to story. You cooperate with friendly characters to defeat enemies and you also protect them. 

The game will be released in 2023! Until then, you can add it to 
your wishlists 👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/16...

Stay tuned for more updates and the public demo is coming very soon to Steam! 

Web: https://nanopike.com
Discord: discord.gg/vJ8QdVv
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Galaxy_Highways
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GalaxyHighways
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/galaxy_high...
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@galaxyhighways
